1984-85 NBA Schedule and Results

1983-84 Schedule and Results 1985-86 Schedule and Results

League Champion: Los Angeles Lakers

Most Valuable Player: Larry Bird (28.7/10.5/6.6)

Rookie of the Year: Michael Jordan (28.2/6.5/5.9)

PPG Leader: Bernard King (32.9)

RPG Leader: Moses Malone (13.1)

APG Leader: Isiah Thomas (13.9)

WS Leader: Larry Bird (15.7)
